William Laure Wagner

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Laurie

  3. Foster Family: Jan Cushman
  4. Location of Family: Exeter, NE

  8. Date of Birth:
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Exeter Journal, 14 June 1902; Exeter Journal, 7 June 1902; National Orphan Train Complex; OTR Vol 4 p 90-93; OTR Vol 6 p 105-115; Article about Henrietta Wiens #195 also p 128 in OTR; Daughter Jo Ann Nerireman.
